refnamediv.refpurpose: Requests execution of a program on the FTP server

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sends a SITE EXEC command request to the FTP server. Returns &true; if the command was successful (server sent response code: 200); otherwise returns &false;.

example.title: ftp_exec example
